title: Shop Designer Gems at 70 Percent Off During Nordstrom’s Winter Sale
description: Alaïa, Khaite, Chloé, Sandy Liang—the list just goes on.
excerpt: Alaïa, Khaite, Chloé, Sandy Liang—the list just goes on.
text: There’s only one good thing about this time of year, and it’s the between-season sales. Right now, you’re fumbling if you aren’t shopping Nordstrom’s Winter Sale. Regardless of whether you’re already looking for swimsuits or if you’re packing for one last ski trip, trust me when I say that this sale section is rife with incredible finds from some of the top designers. Ahead, browse the best items to shop from Nordstrom’s Winter Sale. Nordstrom’s Best Fashion DealsChloé this and Alaïa that—this sale is making me feel like I can shop way outside of my normal tax bracket. Turns out, it’s really fun to get runway pieces for my own closet! Run, don’t walk! You can also score big on end-of-season footwear, including Moon Boots, or stock up on sandals ahead of spring and summer. Now is the time to fill whatever holes may be left in your collection, be it a statement clutch or your first hobo bag since the early aughts. html:
There’s only one good thing about this time of year, and it’s the between-season sales. Right now, you’re fumbling if you aren’t shopping Nordstrom’s Winter Sale. Regardless of whether you’re already looking for swimsuits or if you’re packing for one last ski trip, trust me when I say that this sale section is rife with incredible finds from some of the top designers. Ahead, browse the best items to shop from Nordstrom’s Winter Sale.

Nordstrom’s Best Fashion Deals

Chloé this and Alaïa that—this sale is making me feel like I can shop way outside of my normal tax bracket. Turns out, it’s really fun to get runway pieces for my own closet!

Reformation Auli Halter Top

Now 40% Off

Khaite Cosette Semi Sheer Silk Blend Rib Knit Top

Now 70% Off

Free People Hailee Waffle Stitch Long Sleeve Top & Wide Leg Pants Knit Set

Now 20% Off

Lands' End Cashmere Cardigan Sweater

Now 25% Off

Belle & Bloom Ex-Boyfriend Wool Blend Oversized Jacket

Now 30% Off

HOUSE OF CB Carella Gingham Capri Pants

Now 50% Off

Alaïa Button Front Stretch Wool Pencil Skirt

Now 55% Off

Farm Rio Fruit Bead Embellished Cotton Muscle T-Shirt

Now 45% Off

FRAME Le Sleek High Waist Ankle Straight Leg Jeans

Now 25% Off

Eberjey Gisele Pajamas

Now 32% Off

Alex Mill Marylebone Sweater Jacket with Scarf

Now 45% Off

Missoni Long Sleeveless Dress With Bare Back

Now 30% Off

Nordstrom’s Best Shoe Deals

Attention to all my Sandy Liang fans: Her collaboration with Salomon is on sale right now. Run, don’t walk! You can also score big on end-of-season footwear, including Moon Boots, or stock up on sandals ahead of spring and summer.

Salomon XT-6 Trail Running Shoes

Now 25% Off

Schutz Poppy Stiletto Flip Flop

Now 60% Off

Sandy Liang Crisscross Strap Ballet Flat

Now 55% Off

Adidas Gazelle Indoor Shoes

Now 40% Off

Moon Boot Classic Low

Now 25% Off

Loeffler Randall Margot Pointed Toe Mule

Now 25% Off

Hoka Clifton 9 Running Shoe

Now 25% Off

Steve Madden Dreaming Mary Jane Flat

Now 60% Off

Vince Margaret Knee High Boot

Now 25% Off

Nordstrom’s Best Bag Deals

You can never have too many, right? Now is the time to fill whatever holes may be left in your collection, be it a statement clutch or your first hobo bag since the early aughts.

Teddy Blake Stella Vitello 9”

Now 30% Off

Marni Prisma Leather Crossbody Bag

Now 55% Off

Chloé Mony Leather Tote

Now 50% Off

Mango Kira Snakeskin Embossed Leather Shoulder Bag

Now 30% Off

Senreve Midi Maestra Pebbled Leather 4-Way Convertible Handbag

Now 60% Off

Marc Jacobs The Metallic Leather Shoulder Bag

Now 30% Off

Nordstrom’s Best Beauty Deals

Someone has to say it, so I will; everyone is worried about their neck. Whether it’s the texture, lines, or structure, we’re all just doing our best. That’s why I was excited to find this red light therapy device intended to specifically target that area.

Lunya Washable Silk Sleeping Mask

Now 30% Off

GLO24K LED Neck and Face Beauty Device

Now 25% Off

Shark SpeedStyle Pro Flex Hair Dryer System

Now 13% Off

Valentino High Pigment Refillable Lipstick

Now 40% Off

PURSONIC Professional Water Flosser

Now 20% Off

Anastasia Beverly Hills Natural & Polished Deluxe Eyebrow Kit

Now 20% Off

Nordstrom’s Best Shapewear Deals

Let’s cut right to the chase: Shapewear is an added bonus to any woman’s wardrobes, so why be shy about it? With brands like SKIMS, Commando, and Spanx available, Nordstrom is one of the best places to turn to for undergarments. (And there’s a lot of SKIMS included in the sale right now.)

SKIMS Everyday Sculpt Mid Thigh Bodysuit

Now 50% Off

Spanx Suit Yourself V-Neck Tank Bodysuit

Now 55% Off

Sheertex Stubbornly Strong Super Sheer Tights

Now 45% Off

Alo Airlift Intrigue Bra

Now 20% Off

SKIMS Barely There High Waist Shaper Thong

Now 50% Off

SKIMS Essential Bodysuits Long Sleeve Scoop Neck Thong Bodysuit

Now 40% Off
